meanings.definition: Female friends from one's neighborhood or community.
meanings.sent1: My homegirls and I grew up together in the same neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: Every weekend, my group of homegirls gets together for brunch.
meanings.sent3: When the homegirls heard about the new ice cream shop, we all rushed there together.
meanings.sent4: The bond between my homegirls is as strong as steel, unbreakable and supportive.
meanings.sent5: The laughter and chatter of my homegirls always make me feel at home.

meanings.definition: A group of close female friends.
meanings.sent1: Last night, my homegirls and I had a movie night at my place.
meanings.sent2: I can always count on my homegirls to have my back in any situation.
meanings.sent3: The homegirls decided to have a spontaneous picnic in the park.
meanings.sent4: The bond within our homegirls' group is like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The memories made with my homegirls are treasures I hold dear.

meanings.definition: Women who share a close bond and support each other.
meanings.sent1: My homegirls are always there for me, no matter what.
meanings.sent2: The love and loyalty among my homegirls are unmatched.
meanings.sent3: One of the homegirls suggested a fun road trip, and we all agreed.
meanings.sent4: The connection between my homegirls is like a lifeline in a stormy sea.
meanings.sent5: The strength of my homegirls is a beacon of light in my darkest days.
